name: Letter To A Friend
summary:
"Letter To A Friend" is a short first person experience about the unspeakable horror that creeps up on you at a nightly train station.

Its visual references come from expressionistic silent movies and old analog recordings.

The game was made in 48 hours during the Asylum Jam 2015 and is a proof of concept regarding the visual aestethics and atmosphere. It serves as a basis for an upcoming game.

Graphics, Sound, Programming, Story: Christoph Frey
